Get a tag 

GET /repos/:owner/:repo/git/tags/:tag_sha

Response

Status: 200 OK

{
  "tag": "v0.0.1",
  "sha": "940bd336248efae0f9ee5bc7b2d5c985887b16ac",

    "name": "Scott Chacon",

    "type": "commit",
